i1.name: More_Sparkles!
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an [[champion ability|ability]], '''Zoe's''' next [[basic attack]] or {{ai|Spell Thief|Zoe}} missile within 5 seconds becomes {{tip|projectile|non-projectile}} and deals {{pp|16;20;24;28;32;36;42;48;54;60;66;74;82;90 to 130|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: After casting an champion ability, Zoe's next basic attack or Zoe's Spell Thief missile within 5 seconds becomes non-projectile and deals 16;20;24;28;32;36;42;48;54;60;66;74;82;90undefined − 130undefined (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage.

q1.name: Paddle_Star
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zoe''' shoots a ''star'' in the target direction that detonates upon colliding with an enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area, reduced to 80% for enemies hit beyond the first. The '''total''' damage is increased by {{pp|type=distance traveled|key=%|0 to 150 for 7|800;950;1350;1650;1950;2250;2550}}.
If the ''star'' does not collide with an enemy, it lingers at maximum range for 1 second, allowing ''Paddle Star'' to be recast after {{fd|0.25}} seconds in the duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Zoe''' redirects the ''star'' to the target location, resetting its [[damage modifier]] on cast. The redirected ''star'' can travel beyond the new location, continuing forward until it moves more than 800 units from '''Zoe'''.
''Paddle Star's recast can be used while affected by {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}}.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zoe shoots a star in the target direction that detonates upon colliding with an enemy, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area, reduced to 80% for enemies hit beyond the first. The total damage is increased by 800;950;1350;1650;1950;2250;2550 ‒ undefined.
If the star does not collide with an enemy, it lingers at maximum range for 1 second, allowing Paddle Star to be recast after 0.25 seconds in the duration.
Recast: Zoe redirects the star to the target location, resetting its damage modifier on cast. The redirected star can travel beyond the new location, continuing forward until it moves more than 800 units from Zoe.
Paddle Star's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
q1.notes:
* Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{ai|More Sparkles!|Zoe}}, {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The recast radius matches the initial cast radius of the ability, but '''Zoe''' can move any amount of distance away from the projectile before reactivating.
* ''Paddle Star's'' effect radius is centered around the location of the missile as it collides.

w1.name: Spell_Thief
description: {{sbc|Passive - Spell Thief:}} Whenever enemy champions cast a {{ccib|Summoner spell icon.png|summoner spell}} or {{ccib|Active ability item icon.png|Active ability items|item active}}, they drop the corresponding ''{{as|{{ccib|Spell Thief Minimap.png||Spell Shard}}|armor}}'' onto the ground that grants {{tip|sight}} over a 100-radius area and remains for 40 seconds. Some enemy {{tip|minions}} spawn with random ''{{as|Spell Shards|armor}}'' that only drop to the ground for 20 seconds if killed by '''Zoe'''.

Collecting a ''{{as|Spell Shard|armor}}'' allows '''Zoe''' to activate ''Spell Thief'' within the next 60 seconds. She can replace her current ''Spell Thief'' active by moving directly onto another ''{{as|Spell Shard|armor}}''.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Zoe''' mimics the active of the collected ''{{as|Spell Shard|armor}}''.

{{sbc|Passive - Wheeeee:}} Casting ''Spell Thief'' or one of '''Zoe's''' own summoner spells grants her {{sti|ms|{{As|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the next few seconds, and summons three bubbles that orbit her for the next 10 seconds.

If '''Zoe''' is not affected by {{tip|complete crowd control}} she hurls one bubble at a time at the nearest non-{{tip|sleep|sleeping}} enemy in range, prioritizing her attack target, dealing {{as|magic damage}} with each bubble.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive - Spell Thief: Whenever enemy champions cast a Unknown value: ccib / Summoner spell icon.png / summoner spell or Unknown value: ccib / Active ability item icon.png / Active ability items / item active, they drop the corresponding Unknown value: ccib / Spell Thief Minimap.png / / Spell Shard onto the ground that grants sight over a 100-radius area and remains for 40 seconds. Some enemy minions spawn with random Spell Shards that only drop to the ground for 20 seconds if killed by Zoe.
Collecting a Spell Shard allows Zoe to activate Spell Thief within the next 60 seconds. She can replace her current Spell Thief active by moving directly onto another Spell Shard.
Active: Zoe mimics the active of the collected Spell Shard.
Passive - Wheeeee: Casting Spell Thief or one of Zoe's own summoner spells grants her bonus movement speed for the next few seconds, and summons three bubbles that orbit her for the next 10 seconds.
If Zoe is not affected by complete crowd control she hurls one bubble at a time at the nearest non-sleeping enemy in range, prioritizing her attack target, dealing magic damage with each bubble.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Orb|{{ap|25|35|45|55|65}} {{as|(+ {{fd|13.{{Recurring|3}}}}% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|75|105|135|165|195}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* Mimics the details of the mimicked active.
* '''Zoe''' will cast ''Spell Thief'' in place of her own summoner spells if she has either of them as a collected ''{{as|Spell Shard|armor}}'', even if she tries to cast the summoner spell while it is on cooldown.
* Minions that can drop ''{{as|Spell Shards|armor}}'' are marked with a tied cosmic balloon that floats above them.
** Minions do not drop a shard for {{si|Teleport}}.
* '''Zoe''' utilizes an attack-like animation whenever one of the bubbles hurls itself at an enemy, making it look as if she can attack while moving.
* '''Zoe''' cannot steal [[Consumable item|consumables]], [[trinket]]s, [[Item#Classification|component]] items, or items that create deployable or persistent effects. Some actives are excluded.
{{Zoe Spell Thief list}}

e1.name: Sleepy_Trouble_Bubble
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zoe''' kicks a ''bubble'' in the target direction that bursts on the first enemy hit, or else doing a short 1 second bounce at maximum range then forming a trap on the ground for 5 seconds that arms immediately. The ''bubble'' can only move through terrain once but may do so indefinitely, gaining the distance travelled inside terrain as bonus range, and will fall short if it would enter terrain again.

The ''bubble'' deals {{as|magic damage}} on contact with an enemy and renders them {{tip|drowsy}} for {{fd|1.4}} seconds, which gradually {{tip|slow|slows}} them, after which they fall {{tip|sleep|asleep}} for {{fd|2.25}} seconds.

The next instance of non-{{tip|persistent damage|persistent}} damage that the {{tip|sleep|sleeping}} target takes from {{tip|champions}}, large {{tip|monsters}} or {{tip|structures}} consumes the debuff to deal them {{sti|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} equal to the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} dealt, capped at ''Sleepy Trouble Bubble's'' damage. The '''bonus''' damage is dealt before the triggering damage.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zoe kicks a bubble in the target direction that bursts on the first enemy hit, or else doing a short 1 second bounce at maximum range then forming a trap on the ground for 5 seconds that arms immediately. The bubble can only move through terrain once but may do so indefinitely, gaining the distance travelled inside terrain as bonus range, and will fall short if it would enter terrain again.
The bubble deals magic damage on contact with an enemy and renders them drowsy for 1.4 seconds, which gradually slows them, after which they fall asleep for 2.25 seconds.
The next instance of non-persistent damage that the sleeping target takes from champions, large monsters or structures consumes the debuff to deal them bonus true damage equal to the post-mitigation damage dealt, capped at Sleepy Trouble Bubble's damage. The bonus damage is dealt before the triggering damage.
e1.notes:
* '''Zoe''' will gain {{tip|obscured vision}} of the target while they're {{tip|sleep|asleep}} if they are not {{tip|sight|visible}}.
* If exceptionally close to terrain, the bubble will pass through without detection and will still be able to pass through a second piece of terrain - although it sacrifices any range its already used going through the first piece.
* ''Sleepy Trouble Bubble'' can interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].
* ''Sleepy Trouble Bubble's'' range will be extended if '''Zoe''' casts it right before blinking back from {{ai|Portal Jump|Zoe}}. This is due to the range of the missile being measured at the start of the cast time and '''Zoe''' already having blinked back once the cast time finishes.
* At the end of the path of the initial missile, before continuing with the short bounce, ''Sleepy Trouble Bubble'' checks for targets in a {{tip|er|icononly = true}} 100 radius to immediately collide with.
** This "lollipop" is one of only a few that is larger than the ability's missile width.
* ''Sleepy Trouble Bubble'' can still be collided with during the short bounce between end of initial missile and the trap being formed.
** This seems to use a {{tip|er|icononly = true}} very small or negative collision radius, rather than normal missile collision.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
{{ct|cast|items=false|consume=false|spells=true,false,false,false,false}}

r1.name: Portal_Jump
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zoe''' dives into a portal that she opens beneath her, {{tip|blink|blinking}} a fixed distance in the target direction and remaining there for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, during which she sets her {{as|movement speed}} to a {{as|static 0|ms}} and has {{tip|unobstructed vision}}. After 1 second, she blinks back to her casting position.
'''Zoe''' is unable to basic attack and cast her abilities and movement spells for {{fd|0.75}} seconds after casting ''Portal Jump'' and for {{fd|0.5}} seconds after blinking back.
''Portal Jump'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Zoe's''' basic attack timer.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zoe dives into a portal that she opens beneath her, blinking a fixed distance in the target direction and remaining there for 0.75 seconds, during which she sets her movement speed to a static 0 and has unobstructed vision. After 1 second, she blinks back to her casting position.
Zoe is unable to basic attack and cast her abilities and movement spells for 0.75 seconds after casting Portal Jump and for 0.5 seconds after blinking back.
Portal Jump resets Zoe's basic attack timer.
r1.notes:
* '''Zoe''' will always {{tip|blink}} back.
** She will still be considered to blink even if she fails to move her intended location while {{tip|attach|attached}} (e.g. if she were affected by {{ai|The Show Stopper|Sett}}).
* '''Zoe''' can attack and cast abilities and movement spells at the target location for {{fd|0.5}} seconds after she is able to use them again.
* Upon reaching her destination, '''Zoe''' will either raspberry at the nearest enemy champion, or lick an ice cream cone when there are no enemy champions in {{tip|sight}}.
* '''Zoe''''s return position is shifted by 25 units in the target direction from her cast location.
{{ct|cast|items=false|consume=false|spells=true,false,false,false,false}}
